item.title: install.sh
item.description: ##20:35 Wednesday 26 November 2014 JST## I spent most of the day working on installing a website from git; it has symlinks to a config directory and a vendor directory. We’re not just updating an existing directory, but cloning the repo from git each time. I made a little install.sh file: #!/bin/bash read -p "This will install the latest version from git!! Are you sure? (n) " -n 1 if [[ !
